message: I went to apply and it says "You need permission to access this item."
Ok, I believe I fixed it.. let me know if you have any other troubles with that.

Hey.. i work with two over seas co-founders on a startup and I thought it'd be great to be able to get some of the same advantages that communal workspaces offer local teams.  I made this: www.dotincubate.com... I'm curious of this sort of thing would be interesting to others entrepreneurs.. let me know your thoughts so I can figure out if I should put some energy into it...
